name: Pathway to Chaos (v1)
text:
Can be used by sending 1 "Kuriboh" monster from your hand to the Graveyard.
Change 1 of the following monsters you control to another monster. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
● A monster whose original name contains "Gaia the Fierce Knight": "Black Luster Soldier"
● A monster whose original name is "Black Luster Soldier": "Black Luster Soldier - Super Soldier"
